question: Which of the following schemes has been announced in Budget 2018 for converting cattle dung and solid waste in farms to compost, biogas and bio-CNG?
explanation: In Budget 2018, government announced for Galvanizing Organic Bio-Agro Resources Dhan (GOBAR-DHAN) scheme that aims to convert cattle dung and solid waste in farms to compost, biogas and bio-CNG.
